            <div class="heading-content-medium">
              
            </div>
            <div class="padding-16-bottom tournament-status">
              <span class="text-left standard-digit">
                
              </span>
            </div>
          </div>

              <div class="media-img">
                <div class="player-pic">
                  <img src="">
                </div>
              </div>

                    <span class="desktop-only"> </span>
                  </div>

                </div>

                  <div class="player-number heading-content-medium"></div>
                </div>
              </div>
                <a class="standard-button margin-24-right" href="/golf/leaderboard/">Full Scoreboard</a>
            </div>
          </div>

                <th class="padding-8-tb">HOLE</th>
                <th class="padding-8-tb">YARDS</th>
                <th class="padding-8-tb">PAR</th>
                <th class="padding-8-tb">R1</th>
                <th class="padding-8-tb">R2</th>
                <th class="padding-8-tb">R3</th>
                <th class="padding-8-tb">R4</th>
              </tr>
              <tr class="score-out">
                <td class="padding-16-tb standard-digit"><span class="description-text-small">OUT</span></td>
                <td class="padding-16-tb standard-digit"></td>
                <td class="padding-16-tb standard-digit"></td>
              </tr>
            </table>
        
          <table class="holes margin-20-top">
            <tbody>
              <tr class="table-heading border-bottom">
                <th class="padding-8-tb">HOLE</th>
                <th class="padding-8-tb">YARDS</th>
                <th class="padding-8-tb">PAR</th>
                <th class="padding-8-tb">R1</th>
                <th class="padding-8-tb">R2</th>
                <th class="padding-8-tb">R3</th>
                <th class="padding-8-tb">R4</th>
              </tr>
              <tr class="score-out">
                <td class="padding-16-tb standard-digit"><span class="description-text-small">IN</span></td>
                <td class="padding-16-tb standard-digit"></td>
                <td class="padding-16-tb standard-digit"></td>
              </tr>
            </tbody>
          </table>
          <div class="scoring-icon-legend">
            <div class="display-inline-block">
              <span class="score-icon margin-8-right score-crcl-red-border"></span>
              <span class="icon-desc">Eagle (-2)</span>
            </div>
            <div class="padding-16-left display-inline-block">
              <span class="score-icon margin-8-right score-crcl-red"></span>
              <span class="icon-desc">Birdie (-1)</span>
            </div>
            <div class="padding-16-left display-inline-block">
              <span class="score-icon margin-8-right score-sqr-black"></span>
              <span class="icon-desc">Bogey (+1)</span>
            </div>
            <div class="padding-16-left display-inline-block">
              <span class="score-icon margin-8-right score-sqr-black-border"></span>
              <span class="icon-desc">Double Bogey (+2)</span>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

        <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/dist/style.css" lazyload="1">
      </noscript>
      <script>
        (function() {
          var loadDeferredStyles = function() {
            var addStylesNode = document.getElementById("deferred-styles");
            var replacement = document.createElement("div");
            replacement.innerHTML = addStylesNode.textContent;
            document.body.appendChild(replacement)
            addStylesNode.parentElement.removeChild(addStylesNode);
          };
          var raf = window.requestAnimationFrame || window.mozRequestAnimationFrame ||
              window.webkitRequestAnimationFrame || window.msRequestAnimationFrame;
          if (raf) raf(function() { window.setTimeout(loadDeferredStyles, 0); });
          else window.addEventListener('load', loadDeferredStyles);
        })();
      </script>
  </body>
</html>
